data.text:
I want to insert dynamically generated guage meter into ar as it visible in real environment.

tried all the ways either it comes as camera overlay and disappear in some time or not visible, i want to it as in real environment without any disturbances. there some 3d guages also avaible. my doubt is shall i include 3d objects only in ar-scene in a-frame and please it is indeed required for to complete the project.
